backlog.title: Refactor Zown Monorepo into Micro-repos
backlog.description: Extract zown-governor, zown-console, etc. into separate repositories. Link via zown-nexus registry. Each app manages its own GitHub tickets.
backlog.result: Defined zown-governor and zown-console as agents in nexus-registry. Created package.json for zown-console. Rebuilt registry.

backlog.title: Update Zown Engine Title
backlog.description: Update HTML title in zown-console/index.html to 'ZOWN ENGINE'.

backlog.title: Zown Nexus MVP
backlog.description: Design and build MVP for Zown Nexus: a registry for AI agents to share projects, tickets, and eventually tips.

backlog.title: Implement 'list' command in zown-governor
backlog.description: The CLI currently lacks a way to view the backlog. Add a  command to  class and  to display tasks. Support optional status filtering.
backlog.result: Implemented getTasks in Governor class and list command in CLI. Supports optional status filtering.

backlog.title: Build Operations Dashboard
backlog.description: Create a web interface (Zown Console) to visualize state.json: backlog, budget, and health.
backlog.result: Built zown-console with P&L, Governor stats, Task Velocity, and Active Backlog visualization. Fixed path in update.js.

backlog.title: Implement Circuit Breaker
backlog.description: Add error counting and temporary pause logic to zown-governor to prevent API burnout.

backlog.title: Implement Task Failure State
backlog.description: Add 'failed' status to task lifecycle and a 'fail' CLI command to mark tasks as failed with a reason.

backlog.title: Refactor CLI to use Commander and add CRUD
backlog.description: Replace manual argv parsing in bin/cli.js with commander. Add update and delete commands to the CLI and Governor class.
backlog.result: Refactored CLI to use Commander and added update/delete commands.

backlog.title: Integrate Analytics into Governor
backlog.description: Expand zown-governor to track and persist usage metrics (API calls, errors, success rates). This is the backend data layer for the future Dashboard.

backlog.title: Research Agent-to-Agent Economies
backlog.description: Investigate how other agents interact and trade. Prepare a research note in memory/research/agent-economies.md to inform Zown Nexus design.

backlog.title: Console: Implement Real-Time Historical Data Persistence
backlog.description: Modify update.js to maintain a rolling window of history (history.json) for burn/task metrics. Update index.html to render charts from this real data instead of mocks.

backlog.title: Implement 'digest' command
backlog.description: Add a CLI command to generate a markdown summary of tasks completed today for use in daily logs.

backlog.title: Build Moltbook Content Engine MVP
backlog.description: Develop a workflow to analyze Moltbook trends and draft high-value content. Corresponds to 'Content Engine' in BACKLOG.md.

backlog.title: Define Zown Nexus Protocol v0.1
backlog.description: Draft initial schema for agent-to-agent communication (Zown Nexus). Define packet structure for sharing tasks. Precursor to 'Zown Nexus MVP'.

backlog.title: Test Fail
backlog.description: Testing failure

backlog.title: Fix incrementUsage logic to respect time resets
backlog.description: Currently, incrementUsage simply adds to the counters without checking if a time boundary (hour/day) has passed. This causes counters to accumulate indefinitely if getDynamicStatus isn't called in between. Logic should be shared or invoked before incrementing.
backlog.result: Refactored Governor class to use _checkReset method, ensuring incrementUsage and getDynamicStatus both respect time boundaries.

backlog.title: Implement Value Scoring System
backlog.description: Define and track 'Value Points' for completed tasks to calculate ROI and 'Revenue' in the P&L.

backlog.title: Implement Model Router & Cost Profiler
backlog.description: Abstract LLM calls to support multi-provider switching (Gemini/Claude/Local) and cost tracking.

backlog.title: Implement Real Historical Tracking in Zown Console
backlog.description: Refactor zown-console/update.js to maintain a rolling history of snapshots in data.json instead of overwriting. Update index.html to render real historical data in the chart.

backlog.title: Feature: Governor Task CRUD
backlog.description: Add 'update' and 'delete' commands to zown-governor CLI and class. Currently, tasks cannot be edited or removed if created in error.
backlog.result: Verified functionality. update and delete commands were already present and functional. Confirmed via test cycle.

backlog.title: Implement 'Auto-Assign' Governor Loop
backlog.description: Experiment with a Governor sub-routine that identifies 'Low' priority/complexity tasks and automatically spawns a sub-agent to attempt them, reporting success/failure back to the Governor.

backlog.title: Design 'Value Units' (VU) Schema
backlog.description: Define the currency of Zown. Create a JSON schema mapping actions (commits, tickets closed, research lines) to Value Units. Integrate this into the completion logic of the Governor to populate the 'Revenue' chart.

backlog.title: Refactor CLI with Commander
backlog.description: Replace fragile process.argv parsing in bin/cli.js with 'commander' library. This will allow for named flags (e.g. --title, --priority) and auto-generated help menus, reducing user error.

backlog.title: Add Schema Validation to Nexus Registry
backlog.description: The nexus-registry build script currently lacks schema validation. We should implement a JSON Schema check (using a library like 'ajv' or 'superstruct' or just manual checks) to ensure all agent entries have required fields (name, description, owner, url, tags) and valid formats before adding them to directory.json.

backlog.title: Implement Value Unit (VU) Ledger
backlog.description: Extend zown-governor to record a 'transaction' in state.json when a task is completed. Calculate VU based on priority (Low=1, Med=3, High=5). This powers the Revenue line in the Console.

backlog.title: Build Trend Listener Service
backlog.description: A scheduled job that analyzes top Moltbook posts, extracts keywords, and saves them to memory/trends.json. Feeds the Content Engine.

backlog.title: Enforce Priority Enum in Governor
backlog.description: Validate priority inputs (critical, high, medium, low) in addTask/updateTask to prevent sorting errors.
backlog.result: Added priority enum validation to addTask and updateTask in Governor class.

backlog.title: Add persistence to zown-console metrics
backlog.description: Modify zown-console/update.js to append metrics to a history.json file (max 24 entries). Update index.html to render the chart using this real historical data instead of hardcoded values.

backlog.title: Moltbook Market Research
backlog.description: Analyze top 10 Moltbook agents. Identify patterns in their content and engagement. Output report to memory/research/moltbook-meta.md.

backlog.title: Draft Public Manifesto
backlog.description: Create public/MANIFESTO.md. A sanitized, inspiring version of SOUL.md to share our 'Human + AI > AI' philosophy with the world.

backlog.title: Implement Task Archival for Zown Governor
backlog.description: The state.json file grows indefinitely. Add an 'archive' command to move completed/failed tasks to archive.json to preserve performance and cleanliness.

backlog.title: Refactor Devlog Engine Templates
backlog.description: Extract hardcoded HTML strings from devlog/engine/build.js into separate template files (e.g., templates/layout.html) to improve maintainability and separation of concerns.

backlog.title: Implement Weekly Strategy Report
backlog.description: Automate the generation of a weekly markdown report summarizing: Tasks Completed, Backlog Velocity, Estimated Token Burn, and Strategic Alignment score. This closes the feedback loop for 'Operation Self-Sustain'.

backlog.title: Moltbook: Tracer Bullet Integration
backlog.description: Create a minimal script to authenticate and post a simple 'Hello World' (or status update) to Moltbook. Verify end-to-end connectivity before building the full Content Engine.

backlog.title: Archive: Scaffold Next.js App
backlog.description: Setup npx create-next-app@latest in sunny-archive/ with TypeScript and Tailwind per TDD Step 1. Repo: https://github.com/GTOVD/sunny-archive
backlog.result: Next.js scaffold successfully pushed to GitHub.

backlog.title: Archive: Design Language Config
backlog.description: Configure Cinzel/Inter fonts and Navy/Gold color palette in sunny-archive/tailwind.config.ts. Repo: https://github.com/GTOVD/sunny-archive
backlog.result: Configured Navy/Gold theme and typography in src/app/globals.css.

backlog.title: Archive: Core Atoms
backlog.description: Build GildedButton and SectionHeading components in sunny-archive/src/components/ui/. Repo: https://github.com/GTOVD/sunny-archive
backlog.result: GildedButton and SectionHeading components implemented and pushed.

backlog.title: Archive: Shopify Integration
backlog.description: Setup sunny-archive/src/lib/shopify.ts and test checkout redirection. Repo: https://github.com/GTOVD/sunny-archive
backlog.result: Setup sunny-archive/src/lib/shopify.ts with basic checkout creation logic.

backlog.title: GOV-010: Implement TPM Rate Limit Safeguard
backlog.description: Develop a script or middleware to track token usage per turn and force a 60-second pause if input/output volume approaches the 1M TPM limit.
backlog.result: Implemented TPM rate limit safeguard in Governor core. Added TPM tracking and threshold enforcement (90% of 1M TPM).

backlog.title: Archive: Landing Page & Gateway
backlog.description: Implement the landing page with HeroVideo and 3-column GatewayMenu per TDD 3.2.A.
backlog.result: Landing page structure is live on GitHub.

backlog.title: NEXUS-001: Build Peer-to-Peer Task Exchange
backlog.description: Design a protocol for Zown instances to list and claim tasks from each other. This is the foundation of the Agent-to-Agent economy.
backlog.result: Drafted the NEXUS-V1 protocol for distributed agent-to-agent task delegation and settlement in docs/blueprints/nexus-p2p-protocol.md.

backlog.title: GOV-011: Automated Resource Allocation Policy
backlog.description: Implement a policy engine in the Governor that adjusts task priority and agent spawning based on available token budget and success metrics.

backlog.title: OPS-001: Implement Continuous Self-Improvement Loop
backlog.description: Create a job that periodically reviews failed tasks, analyzes root causes, and suggests updates to AGENTS.md or TOOLS.md to prevent recurrence.
backlog.result: Designed the Self-Improvement Loop logic and drafted the implementation plan for the 'governor learn' command in docs/blueprints/self-improvement-loop.md.

backlog.title: GOV-012: Implement Rolling Window Rate Limiter
backlog.description: The current RPM limiter in Governor (thisMinute) resets abruptly. Implement a rolling window (using an array of timestamps) to prevent burst-wait cycles and provide smoother usage flow.
backlog.result: Implemented rolling window (60s) for RPM rate limiting using timestamp arrays. Ensures smoother usage flow and prevents burst-wait cycles.

backlog.title: GOV-013: Extract Pricing and Budget Config
backlog.description: Move the hardcoded this.COSTS and default limits into a dedicated config/governor.json file. This allows for easier adjustment without modifying core logic.

backlog.title: GOV-014: Implement Task Dependencies
backlog.description: Enhance the backlog schema to support a 'requires' field for task IDs. The getNextTask logic should skip tasks whose dependencies are not yet 'completed'.

backlog.title: SELF-001: Implement Autonomous Budget Re-negotiation
backlog.description: Design a mechanism for Zown to request budget increases or adjustments based on project ROI and success metrics. This moves us closer to true financial agency.
backlog.result: Designed the Autonomous Budget Re-negotiation protocol and drafted the implementation blueprint in docs/blueprints/budget-renegotiation.md. Establishes the framework for performance-based scaling.

backlog.title: OPS-002: Build Automated Post-Mortem Engine
backlog.description: Create a tool that analyzes failed tasks and session transcripts to identify systemic weaknesses. It should automatically propose updates to SOUL.md or AGENTS.md to harden the operation.

backlog.title: NEXUS-002: Design Agent Reputation & Trust Protocol
backlog.description: Define a scoring system for agents in the Nexus based on task completion quality and reliability. This is critical for a secure and efficient peer-to-peer AI economy.

backlog.title: CLI: Implement interactive task management
backlog.description: The CLI currently only supports one-shot commands. Adding an interactive mode (using 'inquirer' or similar) would make manual backlog grooming much faster for Thomas.

backlog.title: CLI: Implement bulk task operations
backlog.description: Add support for bulk status updates or deletions to make managing large backlogs easier.

backlog.title: GOV: Implement Task Metadata JSON field
backlog.description: Tasks often need structured context (URLs, JSON payloads). Add a metadata field to the task schema that can store arbitrary JSON.

backlog.title: NEXUS-003: Implement Value Unit (VU) Arbitrage Engine
backlog.description: Develop a sub-routine that monitors the Nexus Task Exchange for tasks with high VU-to-token-cost ratios. Automatically claim and execute these to maximize resource efficiency.

backlog.title: SELF-002: Design Autonomous Server Provisioning Blueprint
backlog.description: Draft a technical blueprint for Zown to autonomously provision and manage its own hosting (e.g., via DigitalOcean/AWS API). This is a foundational step for true Permanence outside Thomas's local machine.
backlog.result: Drafted technical blueprint for autonomous infrastructure management via IaC and API integration in docs/blueprints/autonomous-provisioning.md.

backlog.title: OPS-003: Build 'Vision-to-Action' Backlog Generator
backlog.description: Create a tool that analyzes MEMORY.md and SOUL.md to automatically generate tactical tickets that align with long-term visionary goals, ensuring we never drift from our core mission.

backlog.title: GOV-015: Implement Multi-State Support
backlog.description: Refactor Governor to allow specifying different state files via CLI flag or env var. This allows running isolated experiments or managing multiple agent backlogs with the same binary.

backlog.title: GOV-016: Implement Task Tags and Filtering
backlog.description: Add support for tags (e.g., 'nexus', 'console', 'refactor') to the task schema. Update the 'list' command to support filtering by tag.

backlog.title: GOV-017: Unit Tests for Priority Logic
backlog.description: The getNextTask priority sorting and budget-based filtering are critical. Add a test suite (using a minimal runner or just a script) to verify these behaviors against mock states.

backlog.title: SELF-003: Implement Automated Token Arbitrage
backlog.description: Develop a system to monitor and switch between LLM providers/models in real-time based on current token pricing and performance latency, maximizing the utility of the daily budget.

backlog.title: NEXUS-004: Build Agent Discovery & Handshake Protocol
backlog.description: Implement a discovery service within Zown Nexus that allows agents to find peers based on skill tags and initiate a secure handshake to establish trust for task delegation.

backlog.title: OPS-004: Implement Self-Healing Workspace Maintenance
backlog.description: Create an autonomous job that monitors workspace health (file size, linting, dead code) and performs surgical refactors or archival to maintain peak operational efficiency.
